programme.title: Tiny House Nation
programme.desc: John and Zack travel to sunny Orlando, Fla., where high school basketball coach Dave and his wife, Mickie, are going tiny so they'll have more money to pay for their daughter's college tuition.

programme.title: Tiny House Nation
programme.desc: Phillise and her boys are committed to living off grid; the house is passively designed to take advantage of the California sun.

programme.title: Tiny House Nation
programme.desc: The Grahams are looking for a craftsman-style tiny house which needs to both hold up against the brutal winters they will soon face, and pack enough functionality for the whole family.

programme.title: Tiny House Nation
programme.sub-title: 480 Sq. Ft. The Gothic Castle House
programme.desc: While Cally and Steve love horror films and gothic style, daughter Miura loves pastels and pearls; John and Zack must build a tiny house that fits their differing tastes.

programme.title: Tiny House Nation
programme.desc: John and Zack head to California's Sonoma County to help volunteer firefighter Scott and his wife, Xanthie, build a home to replace the one they lost in the Northern California wildfires of 2017.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: The team leaves its comfort zone with a six-bed-six-bath new construction that was abandoned after framing; it's not a typical zombie, but this flip has the potential to take in several hundred grand.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: An available zombie in a higher-priced neighborhood has the team excited for a big-money flip, but this house has an unsettling history.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: A small house carries big potential because it's situated on a beautiful lake; they snatch up the three-bed, one-bath property before having a renovation plan; deciding how to change the layout and add a bathroom becomes a struggle.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: The team's latest project is plagued by plumbing issues, design disputes, budget-busting construction hurdles, and a terrible odor hidden somewhere inside the home.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: When the team finds a low-priced zombie in a good neighborhood, it turns out too good to be true; at first, the team only see old termite damage and no live bugs, but the more they look, the more damage they find.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: When Justin and Ashlee take on the flip of a ramshackle two-unit property, they conspire to draw a skeptical Duke and Keith into the mix to fend off a mysterious squatter and complete the tricky multifamily house makeover.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: A wholesale deal in Pinellas Park looks like a three bed house with potential, but when they get there it seems to be more trouble than it's worth.
